      • createRecordableVolume

        BurnVolume createRecordableVolume(java.lang.String volumeName,
                                PauserControlleeIF pauser)
                                  throws java.io.IOException,
                                         AbortedException
        Creates a new volume to record to. When the volume is ready to be burnt, pass it to burnVolume
        Parameters:
        pauser - - allows for the volume creation process to be paused or aborted
        Returns:
        Throws:
